body:
<!-- **Are you in the right place?**
1. For issues or feature requests, please create an issue in this repository.
2. For general technical and non-technical questions, we are happy to help you on our [Rook.io Slack](https://slack.rook.io/).
3. Did you already search the existing open issues for anything similar? -->

**Is this a bug report or feature request?**
* Bug Report

**Deviation from expected behavior:**
The rgw daemons are failing to start in an Octopus cluster. The rgw pod logs show the following:
```
debug 2020-03-27T23:25:08.076+0000 7fda8e616240  0 set uid:gid to 167:167 (ceph:ceph)
debug 2020-03-27T23:25:08.076+0000 7fda8e616240  0 ceph version 15.2.0 (dc6a0b5c3cbf6a5e1d6d4f20b5ad466d76b96247) octopus (rc), process radosgw, pid 1
debug 2020-03-27T23:25:08.076+0000 7fda8e616240  0 framework: beast
debug 2020-03-27T23:25:08.076+0000 7fda8e616240  0 framework conf key: port, val: 80
debug 2020-03-27T23:25:08.077+0000 7fda8e616240  1 radosgw_Main not setting numa affinity
debug 2020-03-27T23:25:23.105+0000 7fda8e616240  1 robust_notify: If at first you don't succeed: (110) Connection timed out
debug 2020-03-27T23:25:23.106+0000 7fda8e616240  0 ERROR: failed to distribute cache for my-store.rgw.log:meta.history
debug 2020-03-27T23:25:23.152+0000 7fda8e616240  0 framework: beast
debug 2020-03-27T23:25:23.153+0000 7fda8e616240  0 framework conf key: ssl_certificate, val: config://rgw/cert/$realm/$zone.crt
debug 2020-03-27T23:25:23.154+0000 7fda8e616240  0 framework conf key: ssl_private_key, val: config://rgw/cert/$realm/$zone.key
debug 2020-03-27T23:25:23.155+0000 7fda8e616240  0 starting handler: beast
debug 2020-03-27T23:25:23.167+0000 7fda8e616240 -1 failed to bind address 0.0.0.0:80: Permission denied
debug 2020-03-27T23:25:23.168+0000 7fda8e616240 -1 ERROR: failed initializing frontend
terminate called after throwing an instance of 'boost::wrapexcept<boost::bad_get>'
  what():  boost::bad_get: failed value get using boost::get
*** Caught signal (Aborted) **
 in thread 7fda57037700 thread_name:rgw_reshard
```

This is the cause of the remaining integration test failures in #4902 

**Expected behavior:**
RGW daemons should run with Octopus.

**How to reproduce it (minimal and precise):**
<!-- Please let us know any circumstances for reproduction of your bug. -->
- Install cluster.yaml with `ceph/ceph:v15`
- `kubectl create -f object.yaml`

Observe RGW daemons crash looping
title: RGW is failing to start in Octopus
